description:
A new vampire with a perverted streak to his powers shows up in Shin-Yokohama and causes chaos and confusion.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Dadan Dan Dan Dadan X / L`affreux jour de congé de Tô Handa / Papa est là
Lewd Talk-a-Talk-Talk-Talk / Tou Handa`s Terrible Day Off / And Then Comes Father
Y Dan Dadandandandadaan / Handa Tou no Sanzan na Hiban no Hi / Soshite Chichi ga Kuru
Y談ダダンダンダンダダーン / 半田桃の散々な非番の日 / そして父が来る
